tables.description: Food Name. This is a principal file. It stores information about each food in the database. It contains a description of each food in English and French as well as dates and comments.

fields.name: FD_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database identifying the food records. This is the primary key.

fields.name: FD_CODE
fields.description: Identifier code for the foods. In the 2007b version this was the FD_C

fields.name: FD_GRP_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the food groups

fields.name: FD_SRC_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the food sources.

fields.name: A_FD_NME
fields.description: Abbreviated food name in English

fields.name: A_FD_NMF
fields.description: Abbreviated food name in French

fields.name: L_FD_NME
fields.description: Complete food name in English

fields.name: L_FD_NMF
fields.description: Complete food name in French

fields.name: COUNTRY_C
fields.description: Corresponds to the USDA NDB code

fields.name: FD_DT_ENT
fields.description: Date the food name data was entered into the database

fields.name: FD_DT_PUB
fields.description: Date the food name data was originally published

fields.name: SCI_NM
fields.description: Scientific name of the food

tables.description: Nutrient Amount. This is the main file. It uses information (by linking) from the FOOD_ NM table (among others) to identify which nutrients and amounts are recorded for that food.

fields.name: FD_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database identifying the food records.

fields.name: NT_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the nutrient names

fields.name: NT_VALUE
fields.description: Mean value in 100g, edible portion. (The number of decimal places does not reflect the accuracy of the data.).

fields.name: STD_ERR
fields.description: Standard error of the mean

fields.name: NUM_OBS
fields.description: Number of samples

fields.name: NT_SRC_ID
fields.description: Identifier code generated by the database for the nutrient source

fields.name: NT_DT_ENT
fields.description: Date the data was entered into the database

fields.name: NT_TR
fields.description: Trace nutrient identifier. The nutrient is likely present, but at a level below significant contribution to the diet or beneath a level that can be measured adequately.

tables.description: Conversion Factor. This is a principal file. This file contains portion size conversion factors. The conversion factors are food specific multipliers by which the nutrient values for each food may be multiplied to give the nutrients in described portions.

fields.name: FD_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database identifying the food records.

fields.name: MSR_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the measure descriptions

fields.name: CONV_FAC
fields.description: The factor by which one would multiply the nutrient per 100g to obtain nutrient amounts per the measure described (the weight of that food in the measure described divided by 100)

fields.name: CF_DT_ENT
fields.description: Date the data was entered into the database

tables.description: Refuse Amount. This is a principal file. This file contains the percent of refuse, or inedible portion, for each food.

fields.name: FD_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database identifying the food records.

fields.name: REFUSE_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the refuse descriptions

fields.name: REFUSE_AMT
fields.description: Percent refuse

fields.name: CF_DT_ENT
fields.description: Date the data was entered into the database

tables.description: Yield Amount. This is a principal file. This file contains the yield from refuse and/or cooking losses assigned to certain foods. These yields are most often used for food inventory purposes.

fields.name: FD_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database identifying the food records.

fields.name: YLD_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the yield descriptions

fields.name: YLD_AMT
fields.description: Yield from refuse and/or cooking losses

fields.name: CF_DT_ENT
fields.description: Date the data was entered into the database

tables.description: Food Group. This file is a support or "list" table that is used to link to the FOOD_NM table. It contains a list of 23 different group headings (in English and French) based on similar characteristics of the foods.

fields.name: FD_GRP_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the food groups

fields.name: FD_GRP_COD
fields.description: Identifier code for the Canadian Nutrient File food groups. There are 23 different CNF food groups

fields.name: FD_GRP_NME
fields.description: Food group name in English

fields.name: FD_GRP_NMF
fields.description: Food group name in French

tables.description: Food Source. This file is a support or "list" table that is used to link to the FOOD_NM table. It contains a list of several food sources (in English and French) that foods can be grouped on.

fields.name: FD_SRC_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the food sources

fields.name: FD_SRC_COD
fields.description: Identifier code for the food sources. Food sources give an indication as to Canadian content

fields.name: FD_SRC_NME
fields.description: Food Source description in English

fields.name: FD_SRC_NMF
fields.description: Food Source description in French

tables.description: Nutrient Name. This file is a support or "list" table that contains the list of nutrients (in English and French) used in the NT_AMT file, with which it is linked.

fields.name: NT_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the nutrient names

fields.name: NT_COD
fields.description: Identifier code for nutrient name descriptions

fields.name: NT_SYM
fields.description: Nutrient symbol or abbreviation of the nutrients. They may differ from international nomenclature.

fields.name: UNIT
fields.description: Unit of measure (e.g., mg, g, mcg)

fields.name: NT_NME
fields.description: Nutrient name in English

fields.name: NT_NMF
fields.description: Nutrient name in French

fields.name: TAGNAME
fields.description: International Network of Food Data Systems (INFOODS) Tagnames. A unique Abbreviation for a food component developed by INFOODS to aid in the interchange of data.

fields.name: NT_DEC
fields.description: Number of decimal places used in the rounding of the nutrient value

tables.description: Nutrient Source. This file is a support or "list" table that is used to link to the NT_AMT file. It contains a list of several sources and/or types of nutrient data (in English and French).

fields.name: NT_SRC_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the nutrient sources

fields.name: NT_SRC_COD
fields.description: Identifier code for nutrient source descriptions.

fields.name: NT_SRC_NME
fields.description: Nutrient source description in English

fields.name: NT_SRC_NMF
fields.description: Nutrient source description in French

tables.description: Measure. This file is a support or "list" table that is used to link to the CONV_FAC table. It contains a list of measures (in English and French).

fields.name: MSR_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the measure descriptions

fields.name: MSR_NME
fields.description: Measure description in English

fields.name: MSR_NMF
fields.description: Measure description in French

tables.description: Refuse Name. This file is a support or "list" table that is used to link to the REFUSE table. It contains a list of refuse types.

fields.name: REFUSE_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the refuse descriptions

fields.name: REFUSE_NME
fields.description: Refuse description in English

fields.name: REFUSE_NMF
fields.description: Refuse description in French

tables.description: Yield Name. This file is a support or "list" table that is used to link to the YIELD table. It contains a list of yield types or yield descriptions (in English and French).

fields.name: YLD_ID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the yield descriptions

fields.name: YLD_NME
fields.description: Yield description in English

fields.name: YLD_NMF
fields.description: Yield description in French
